articles.title: Watch: Donald Trump's former chief of staff explains why he doesn't want him to run in 2024 - CNN Video
articles.description: Donald Trump's former acting chief of staff Mick Mulvaney explains how the January 6 committee hearings are hurting the former President and who Mulvaney thinks would be better candidates for the Republican party in 2024.

articles.title: Migrants from multiple countries overwhelm US-Mexico border, adding to Biden administration's challenges

articles.content:

articles.author: Angela Fritz
articles.title: Originally forecast for 2050, next week's temperatures are alarmingly ahead of schedule
articles.description: The "plausible" UK heat forecast becomes reality early next week -- 28 years early.
articles.content:
Two years ago, forecasters in the UK conducted an interesting thought experiment: What will our forecasts look like in 2050?

articles.title: Joe Manchin, who just torpedoed Democrats' climate agenda, has long ties to coal industry
articles.description: West Virginia Sen. Joe Manchin's long-standing financial ties to the coal industry face scrutiny after sources familiar with high-level negotiations told CNN he would not support the climate provisions of his party's proposed economic package.

articles.title: Manchin's interests are 'his family and his own pocketbook' says Errol Lewis - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN political commentators Errol Lewis and Scott Jennings discuss Sen. Joe Manchin (D-WV) telling Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer (D-NY) that he won't support the Democratic economic package that the two had been negotiating for months.
